transcript.text: have you been seeking healing for
yourself and feel like you're beating
your head against the wall
have you tried to get other people
healed and feel like you just don't know
what you're missing and what you haven't
tried well if this describes you I've
got some good news for you my name is
praying medic and for the last few years
I've been healing the sick in ambulances
in nursing homes and in hospitals and
God has given me hundreds of dreams
where he's released to me keys to
healing for the first time I'm taking my
experiences and the revelation that God
has given me and I'm making it available
to you in an online class in this class
you'll learn about your true identity as
a believer you'll learn about the nature
of God you'll learn about faith power
and authority for healing I'll teach you
about emotional healing deliverance and
how to raise the dead there's even
lessons on why some people are not
healed and the courts of heaven the
class is available on all electronic
devices including smartphones and it's
self-paced that means you can take the
lessons in any order that you want you
can take as long as you want to complete
them and you can review the videos as
many times as you need there's a wave of
healing and miracles sweeping the globe
if you're ready to join the healing
revolution click on the link below this
video and get started today
